artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Utagawa Hiroshige II; Publisher: Hiranoya Shinzō; Carver: Ōta Tashichi
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: combined date and censor seal: 子七改 {ne nana aratame} (Rat 7 inspected); publisher's seal: 万丁平のや {Yorozuchô Hiranoya}; carver's seal: 彫多七 {hori Tashichi}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Pride of Edo: Thirty-Six Amusements (Edo jiman sanjūrokkyō 江戸自慢三十六興)
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 喜翁豊國画 {kiō Toyokuni ga}, 廣重画 {Hiroshige ga}
title: Hashiba Ferry in Snow
